`[`*[DeveloperAPIProfilingExceptions Prev - Syncless.Profiling.Exceptions]* `|` *[DeveloperAPITaggingExceptions Next - Syncless.Tagging.Exceptions]*`]`

Provides classes necessary for creating/removing tags, tagging/untagging folders, managing other settings such as the filter settings per tag.

= Classes Summary =

|| *Class* || *Description* ||
|| [#CurrentTime CurrentTime] || Provides properties which enclose the `DateTime.Now` property. The object created allows for repeated use of the same `DateTime.Now` property value. ||
|| [#LogMessage LogMessage] || Provides static string values which are used for logging events invoked in the Tagging namespace. ||
|| [#Tag Tag] || Represents a container for a list of `TaggedPath` objects.  Each `Tag` object has its properties that uniquely identifies itself from other `Tag` objects. ||
|| [#TagConfig TagConfig] || Provides the configuration options of `Tag` object. ||
|| [#TaggedPath TaggedPath] || Encloses properties of a folder path and provides operations to manipulate the properties. ||
|| [#TaggingHelper TaggingHelper] || Provides some common methods which may be used by other classes under the Tagging namespace. ||
|| [#TaggingLayer TaggingLayer] || The main logic controller of the Tagging namespace. ||
|| [#TaggingProfile TaggingProfile] || Represents a container for a list of `Tag` objects.  Each `TaggingProfile` has its properties that uniquely identifies itself from other `TaggingProfile` objects. ||
|| [#TaggingXMLHelper TaggingXMLHelper] || Provides XML-related operations to load and save tagging.xml file. ||
|| [#TagMerger TagMerger] || Performs merging of several tagging profiles which have the same name. ||
